name: Cast 'N' Blast: Bloody Battles
description:
Oh no! Solita left the front door to the castle open and now an army of Shellies have stormed in! That's no good. Help her pick up the STEEL ROD and commit one violent atrocity after another, all in the same hallway.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a parody based on my friend Kunedon's game, made for his birthday. If you enjoyed this, try out his own games:

https://kunedon.itch.io/

If you're not a fan of blood don't worry: you can set it off in the game's title screen.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

 Z = Jump
X = Shoot
V = Reload
F4 = Toggle Fullscreen/Window Size
ESCAPE = Quit game
